item.title: Attack Graphs - How to create and present them
item.description: Conceptual Attack Graphs One question that I have gotten a few times about “Cybersecurity Attacks - Red Team Strategies” is around the conceptual attack graphs in “Chapter 3, Measuring an Offensive Security Program”. Specifically, how I create them. In this post I will briefly go over some of the reasons for creating them, and also how I create them and share a template for others to use and adjust. I’m not a graphic designer, so I’m sure there are better ways of doing this.
